name: cms-media-bridge
description: Examples and reference modules for HubSpot Media Bridge embeds
author: lbryant <lbryant@hubspot.com>

scripts.upload: hs upload mb-embed.module media-bridge/mb-embed.module && hs upload mb-email-embed.module media-bridge/mb-email-embed.module
scripts.fetch: hs fetch media-bridge/mb-embed.module && hs fetch media-bridge/mb-email-embed.module
